title: Secure Authentication and Role-Based Access Control
summary: Develop a secure authentication system with multi-factor capabilities and role-based access control.
description: Implement a secure authentication framework that allows customers to log into the self-service portal using multi-factor authentication (MFA) for enhanced security. Introduce robust encryption mechanisms for data in transit and at rest. Establish role-based access control (RBAC) mechanisms to ensure each user can access only the features and data appropriate to their role and authorization level. The module will comply with banking security policies, regulatory requirements, and industry best practices.

title: Responsive User Interface and Accessibility
summary: Design and implement a responsive and user-friendly interface for the self-service portal.
description: Develop a modern, intuitive user interface that provides a seamless and consistent experience across desktops, tablets, and mobile devices. Ensure that the design adheres to accessibility standards (such as WCAG 2.1) and usability principles to accommodate all types of users. The interface should prioritize clarity, responsiveness, and simplicity, reducing the number of steps required to complete key actions while maintaining visual consistency across different platforms.

title: Personalized Dashboard Development
summary: Build a personalized dashboard displaying banking products and eligibility-based services.
description: Create an intelligent and customizable dashboard that displays key financial information such as account balances, recent transactions, and recommended products or services tailored to the user’s profile and eligibility. The dashboard will update in real-time through integration with the bank’s core system to ensure accuracy. It should include shortcuts for frequently used functions and visual insights to improve usability and engagement.

title: Online Account Opening and Service Request Workflows
summary: Enable customers to submit account opening and service modification requests online.
description: Design and develop end-to-end workflows allowing customers to open new accounts or request modifications to existing banking services directly through the portal. These workflows must minimize user friction by utilizing auto-filled data, adaptive forms, and simplified navigation. Ensure all validations are enforced in real-time and integrate approval flows and backend system interactions for seamless request handling and compliance validation.

title: Document Upload and Draft Application Management
summary: Allow users to save incomplete applications and upload supporting documentation securely.
description: Implement functionality for users to save incomplete applications as drafts and return to complete them later without losing progress. Add secure document upload features enabling customers to attach and manage required supporting documents directly within the portal. Files will be stored in encrypted form, with appropriate access controls and an audit trail to comply with banking regulations and privacy policies.

title: Request Tracking and Notification System
summary: Provide customers visibility into request status and deliver real-time notifications.
description: Develop a notification and status tracking module that enables customers to view the current status of their account requests or service modifications in real-time. Integrate automated notification systems (email and in-app) to inform users of updates, approvals, or required actions. The module should include message templates, delivery confirmations, and a notification history log accessible through the user’s dashboard.

title: Core Banking System Integration
summary: Integrate the self-service portal with the bank’s existing core banking systems.
description: Develop and implement secure integration layers connecting the self-service portal with the core banking system. Use APIs or microservices to synchronize customer data, account information, and workflows between systems in real-time. Ensure data consistency and high availability through asynchronous processing, retries, and reconciliation mechanisms. The integration must comply with the bank’s information security and compliance standards.

title: Dedicated Portal Database and Performance Optimization
summary: Establish a dedicated database and optimize system performance for scalability.
description: Design and implement an optimized database dedicated to the self-service portal for managing user sessions, requests, and application data. Apply best practices in indexing, caching, and data partitioning to ensure consistent performance and quick response times. Implement monitoring tools to detect performance bottlenecks, while ensuring high availability, disaster recovery, and compliance with data retention policies.

title: Interaction Logging and Audit History
summary: Maintain a comprehensive log of all customer interactions and portal activities.
description: Build a secure audit trail capturing every customer interaction and transaction performed within the portal. Enable customers to review their history of requests, changes, and communications from their dashboard while maintaining immutable backend logs for administrative oversight and compliance audits. The logging system should include timestamping, version control, and encryption, adhering to banking and regulatory data storage requirements.
